recipe.name: Strength Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases Strength but reduces Agility and Intelligence

recipe.name: Gathering Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases Gathering, Gathering Speed and Weight Limit

recipe.name: Lethal Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases Basic Attack Crit but reduces Skill Bonus

recipe.name: Regeneration Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases max HP and HP Recovery

recipe.name: Ironskin Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases Resistances, Block but reduces damage and healing

recipe.name: Cooldown Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Speeds up cooldown but reduces damage and healing

recipe.name: Lifesteal Potion Recipe
recipe.description: Increases Basic Attack Lifesteal but reduces max HP
